Posts.Content: sufia wrote: Hi I am a 23 year old with no family history of breast cancer. But recently, I have seen a red little area, on my skin over the nipple. when i press it hard, it feels like a lump. i have seen my family doctor and she says its a cyst. she hasnt referred me to a surgeon. I am worried. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: red coloured area sufia SilverOcean
